name: Certified Capital Group
overview:
Certified Capital Group, Llc., Orlando, Florida, is a Private Equity Venture Capital company with a history of direct equity investments into early and mid stage companies in a variety of industries.

Certified Capital Group offers its clients additional services which include expertise with initial due diligence and preparation of materials required for a successful fund raising event. On large capitalization projects Certified Capital Group may choose to co-invest with its equity partner(s). Contact Certified Capital Group at certified@worldramp.net
